name: LAST HUMAN
description:
PLEASE USE DOWNLOADED VERSIONS FOR BEST QUALITY SOME FEATURES ARE NOT SUPPORTED IN WEBGL

In a post-apocalyptic future, the evil robots control the life support facility. But you are a robot with a different goal. You must escape the facility and keep the last human alive.

Will you make it out?

Rate the game on our Ludum Dare 46 page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/$180660

Updates
  • Version 1.0.1:
    • Fix for issues when restarting level
  • Version 1.0.2:
    • Fixed interacting with mods after a game over/return to menu
    • Fixed issues with mod drop chance
